description: House-made pasta served with a classic Alfredo cream sauce.
Fresh salmon cooked to perfection, served with a lemon-butter sauce.
Thin-crusted pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, juicy tomatoes, and sweet basil.
16 oz. steak seasoned and grilled to your preference, served with house steak sauce.
Juicy jumbo shrimps and linguini tossed with garlic and olive oil.
A hearty bowl of vegetable soup simmered in a rich tomato base.
Fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, and basil leaves, drizzled with olive oil and balsamic reduction.
Pan-seared scallops served with a tangy lemon butter sauce.
Grilled chicken covered in a sweet and smoky honey glaze.
Large mushrooms stuffed with cheese, garlic, and herbs.
Romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, and croutons dressed in a creamy Caesar dressing.
Juicy beef patty, fresh lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and cheese served with crispy fries.
Creamy risotto with chunks of succulent lobster.
Slow-cooked ribs smothered in our signature BBQ sauce.
Seasoned green beans sautéed with garlic and shallots.
Lightly battered and fried rings of calamari served with tangy tartar sauce.
Healthy quinoa mixed with fresh veggies and a light vinaigrette.
Spaghetti served with rich and meaty tomato sauce.
Crispy skin duck served with Chinese pancakes and traditional condiments.
Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese.
Marinated in a mixture of spices and grilled to perfection, served with cucumber raita.
Fresh cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, feta cheese, and red onions, with an herby vinaigrette.
Lobster cooked in a creamy cheese sauce, then placed back into its shell.
Creamy and smooth cheesecake served with a side of mixed berries.
